annotations: "For Member Registration, Members register into the system by filling in the registration form."
"Then, the system validates the information entered by the member."
"If the information is valid, the new member is added to the system."
Then members can borrow books.
"First, Members log into the application."
"Then, members search for the book they want to borrow using the search feature."
"Then, the member selects the book they want to borrow and enters the number of books they want to borrow."
The system will validate the availability of the book.
"If the book is available, the system records the loan and reduces the number of book stocks."
"To return books, the member must enter the application."
"Then, Members see a list of books borrowed."
Members then select the books to return.
The system then records the return of the book and increases the number of book stocks.
The application can also be used by librarians.
Librarians can manage Book Catalogs.
"First, the Librarian enters the system."
"Second, librarians can add new books to the library catalog."
"Finally, the librarian can delete a book from the catalog if the book is no longer available or damaged."
The librarian can also search for member information by logging into the system.
"Then, Librarians can search for member information based on name or member number."
"So, librarians can see members' borrowing history."
Users must register first before using the telemedicine application.
Users are patients who have received treatment at the hospital before and patients who are using the hospital's health services for the first time.
Users can search for doctors based on the doctor's name or the name of the clinic / specialist.
"Next, the user sees the available telemedicine consultation schedule."
Users can make a consultation if it coincides with an online doctor's practice or come back later according to the target doctor's schedule.

"The hospital administration department registers doctors who provide telemedicine services in the application, then enters the telemedicine schedule according to the schedule of the doctor concerned."
"In telemedicine sessions, doctors provide consultation services via the chat feature to users according to complaints and symptoms submitted by users in the telemedicine application."
Users can send pictures or short videos about their health condition via the application.

"Based on the results of the consultation, the doctor can recommend a physical examination, ask the user to come to the hospital according to the doctor's schedule, or prescribe medication for the user via the telemedicine application."
"All text messages, images, videos and recipes are recorded by the system."
Users have the option to buy medicine at the hospital pharmacy or at the user's subscription pharmacy.
"If the user buys at the hospital pharmacy, the pharmacy department accesses the prescription and prepares the medicine according to the prescription."
Medicine purchasing services at hospital pharmacies are only available to users whose residence is a maximum of 30 km from the hospital.
"Next, the pharmacy sends the medicine to the user's address using the send medicine feature in the telemedicine application, this feature is connected to the online transportation service."
"In our Online Shopping System, customers begin by registering an account, providing essential details such as name, email, password, and address."
"Once registered, customers can browse products by category or search for specific items."
They can add chosen products to their cart and proceed to checkout.
"During checkout, customers confirm their order, input shipping details, choose a payment method, and make the payment through a secure payment gateway. "
"Upon successful payment, the system confirms the order and sends a confirmation email to the customer."
Customers can track their orders in real-time through the 'Order History' section.
"Meanwhile, administrators (another actor) have access to an admin dashboard. "
"From here, they can manage products by adding, updating, or removing items, as well as oversee customer information, including updating details or deactivating accounts."
"Admins can also manage orders by viewing order details, updating statuses, and canceling orders if necessary. "
"These interactions form the core functionalities of our Online Shopping System, facilitating seamless transactions and efficient management for both customers and administrators"
"In the context of our Travel Booking System, customers can initiate their journey by searching for available travel options. "
"They can browse through various destinations, select preferred travel dates, and explore different modes of transportation, such as flights, trains, or buses."
"After choosing their preferred option, customers proceed to the booking phase."
"During booking, customers input passenger details, select seating preferences, and make payment via a secure payment gateway. "
"The system then generates a booking confirmation, which is sent to the customer's email. "
"Additionally, customers can manage their bookings by viewing their travel history, changing travel dates, or canceling reservations within a specified timeframe."
"On the other side, travel agents (actors) have access to an agent portal."
"Here, they can assist customers in finding suitable travel options, make bookings on behalf of customers, and manage reservations. "
"The system also enables travel agents to check seat availability, update booking statuses, and issue refunds when necessary."
"These interactions define the core functionalities of our Travel Booking System, ensuring a seamless experience for customers and travel agents alike."
"In the realm of Healthcare Management System, patients, doctors, and administrators are the key actors."
"Patients begin by scheduling appointments with their preferred doctors, specifying the reason for the visit and providing essential health information. "
"Upon arrival at the clinic or hospital, patients check in using self-service kiosks or mobile apps, reducing waiting times. "
"Doctors access the system to view their appointments, review patient medical histories, and update diagnoses and treatments. "
"They can prescribe medications electronically, and the prescriptions are sent directly to pharmacies for easy retrieval by patients."
"Laboratory technicians enter test results into the system, which doctors can then access for analysis. "
"Administrators oversee the system, managing doctor schedules, updating patient records, and ensuring smooth operation."
"In emergency cases, patients can be admitted quickly by administrators, triggering instant notifications to the medical staff."
"The Healthcare Management System optimizes the patient experience, streamlining the administrative tasks for healthcare providers and ensuring efficient, accurate, and timely healthcare services."
"In the domain of Social Networking Platforms, users, content creators, and administrators are the primary actors. "
"Users begin by creating profiles, adding personal information, and connecting with friends."
"They can post text, images, and videos on their timelines, engaging with content shared by others. "
"Content creators, a subset of users, produce multimedia content, gaining followers and likes. "
"Users can comment on and share content, fostering a vibrant community. "
"Administrators monitor user activity, ensuring compliance with community guidelines."
"They can issue warnings, suspend accounts, or remove inappropriate content."
"Users receive notifications for likes, comments, and friend requests, enhancing their interactive experience."
"Content creators can track the performance of their posts through analytics, enabling them to tailor content to their audience."
"Social Networking Platforms empower users to express themselves, connect with others globally, and provide content creators with a platform to showcase their creativity and expertise."
"User must login before proceed into the app."
"If user doesnï¿½t have account, user must register first."
"Admin can manage user profile, delete history and proceed checkout."
"After short period user then directed into checkout page."
"After browse the item, user then proceed to checkout for payment."
"The customer enters the payment account information."
"The customer select a payment date."
"The customer selects a valid recurring payment date."
"User send the request to their supervisor for approval."
"Their supervisor receives the time-off request."
